phrases: given to the boy and girl in each class with the top test scores.
Free lunch at the school cafeteria.
I never cared about those perks, though.
It proved you were top of the class.
That is the kind of status the pin conferred upon you,
and I was proud of myself when I wore it.
Y-Yeah, but I am waiting for Honoka.
Ryo's notebook was lying on the floor in the hallway.
Sorry, it got a bit heavy.
This is why I told you to let me carry half.
He was just in the same class last year.
What was with that victorious smirk?!
She was trying for a friendly smile.
What part of that was friendly?!
I cannot get that face out of my head!
Why is she flashing that gross face at me?!
Rena, you are definitely pissed off.
I feel sorry for your fried rice.
How do you drink milk with rice?
They did not give us an option back then!
I am going to drink a ton of milk and grow taller for volleyball.
Honoka wound up beating me on every part of the fitness test.
As for your name, I am sorry.
I do not know it, so I could not use it.
I am the only one who sees us as rivals.
They just keep outdoing me easily, without even caring.
I hate that I am no match for her,
I do not think I can ever come to terms with her!
Why is she eating alone in the cafeteria?!
Trying to make herself look lonely?!
Waiting for some dude to hit on her?!
How long is this going to go on?
It is only our third try!
Counting the real one, it is your fourth!
I do not know how you can take tests for a month straight!
Do not you even want to be free?!
At this rate, we will need to hold study sessions through Golden Week...
I am starting to lose confidence in my teaching.
I am trying to take the first step toward not being a friendless loner.
Let us invite her here to eat with us!
And we can have her help tutor you two!
You two are on friendly terms.
Uh, no, that is not it...
We would better not ask her.
She is alone, and we could use the help!
You do not want any other guys getting close to Hishiro-san.
If you want to talk to me about love, come back in another ten years!
An and I just have to buckle down and pass, right?
Put Hishiro-san on hold for now.
He are not buying that at all.
I do not get it, but whatever.
We will do our best to pass.
Might be none of my business,
but I do not want to see her and Kariu fight.
But maybe I hurt Hishiro-san's chances a bit.
Just when Oga thought to invite her over.
Now she is going to stay alone.
Wait, why is this my problem?
Hishiro-san, do not you have any friends to eat lunch with?
Did not I tell you I had no friends already?
It feels like I might make a friend soon.
I think I have been getting along with Kariu-san lately.
Did something happen between them when I was not looking?
Kariu looked ready to kill at lunch.
This is totally Hishiro-san misreading things.
How bad is she at observing those around her?
Not to mention, she sucks at remembering names.
Maybe she does not care about other people?
Kids these days are so unsocial.
But damn... she really is totally alone.
You are all alone, too, anyway.
As a pair of loners, the two of you should get along.
Considering you are trying to be nice, you sure have a rude way of putting it.
What do you mean, I am all alone anyway?
I choose not to mingle for work reasons.
I cannot exactly stalk you if I am with Hishiro-san.
You were in the same class as her last year,
and you sit next to her.
If it is that important, why not invite her yourself?
It sounds like you really care.
What happened to staying in the background all year?
I think it is a good thing, you know.
You are paying attention to those around you.
You do not just notice... you take action to help.
I think it is one of your strengths.
Is getting rid of all the thorns in someone is path
really what is best for them?
While they are still young enough to be allowed to trip and fall,
it is important for them to learn the pain of it
and how to pick themselves up again.
So you think my attempts to help would not benefit them?
I just said what crossed my mind.
You can live your ReLIFE any way you see fit, Kaizaki-san.
Somewhere along the line, my life...
I mean, is not it a shame?
I just want them all to enjoy the time they are having at school.
Maybe I am thinking like an old man prone to lectures...
But seeing your friends every day like it is nothing...
With those young kids, give your mind and heart a solid workout.
Let your heart, which had dried up and gotten stiff, beat once more.
I have been at this ReLIFE thing a whole month.
Not sure if it went by in a flash or lasted forever.
I have got a committee meeting, so here.
A handout for your make-up retest.
With you gone, I figured we would not be studying today.
Did not you say you would do your best?
You know there is a study room at the end of the second floor, right?
Be sure to solve that before you leave.
Let us go to the committee meeting.
Does she smile at Oga the way she smiles at Kaizaki?
I told you they would still be at it.
Sorry, I totally lost track of time!
I am not leaving yet, anyway.
You need to catch your train, right?
I will go get changed in a jiffy!
Tama-chan always makes you stay late with her, huh?
she seems to be enjoying practice a lot more than she used to.
I am the one making her stay.
You are doing more for her!
Waiting this late to go home with her.
If we let Tama-chan ride a train alone,
who knows where she would end up?
Our parents insist we have to look after her and bring her
When you are done, lock up the clubroom and gym
and return the key to the staff room.
Spending every day with nice childhood friends.
Oh, we got the same scores!
Let us work hard together as the class reps for first term.
I was the Class 1 rep the first term of my first year.
But I did not come first the next two terms.
so I made sure I had the silver pin for all of last year.
I never let go of the silver pin, but...!
Why cannot I do anything right?
I cannot stand being like this!
Is this what it means to age?
I am here to return the gym key.
Proof that you are number one.
it was not just the status.
She got everything without looking like she put in any effort at all!
I will just walk casually out of school and ditch it at the station bathroom.
I was using the study room.
The teacher said to lock up
and bring the key by the staff room when I was done.
I just returned the gym key, too.
I do not know where to put the keys.
I cannot stop to chat here!
Sorry, but can you come with and show me?
If I waste too much time,
Hishiro will leave the staff room!
I have got to get home.
Sorry, but could you ask a teacher?
Why do you have two bags?
I mean, for my practice clothes...
I was not bad at sports,
and despite taking two years to get into college, I was not bad at studying, either.
and managed to land a job all right.
I thought I had a fulfilling adult life waiting for me.
